Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.12 Ajjhattikaduka » 10.12.1 Paṭiccavāra » 10.12.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 10.12.1.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Ārammaṇa
Mahantaraduka
Ajjhattikaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Ārammaṇa
321.
3106Ajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—  cittaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā; paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā. (1)
3107Bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—  bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā. (1)
3108Bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—  bāhire khandhe paṭicca cittaṃ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhire khandhe paṭicca cittaṃ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca cittaṃ. (2)
3109Bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—  bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca cittaṃ sampayuttakā ca khandhā. (3)
3110Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṃ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—  bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca…pe…  (Saṃkhittaṃ.) (1)
